content:
I can provide you with some popular street food dishes that are must-try:

1. pad thai - stir-fried noodles with egg, tofu, shrimp, or chicken.

2. som tam - a spicy and sour green papaya salad.

3. tom yum goong - a hot and sour soup made with shrimp, lemongrass, and spices.

4. khao soi - a northern-style curry soup with egg noodles and chicken.

5. kai jeow - a thai-style omelet with vegetables and minced pork.

6. satay - grilled meat skewers served with peanut sauce.

7. mango sticky rice - a sweet dessert made with sticky rice, mango, and coconut milk.

8. roti - a crispy flatbread served with sweet or savory fillings.

there are many other delicious dishes to try as well, so be sure to explore the great variety of street food available in bangkok during songkran and beyond.
